name: http-chameleon
description: A versatile HTTP server that adapts to your needs - mock API responses with file-based JSON storage or proxy requests to external services with CORS support

meta.title: HTTP Chameleon
meta.description: Dual-mode HTTP server for development and testing. Switch seamlessly between file-based JSON mocks with smart path mapping and ID lookup, or proxy to external APIs with full CORS support. Zero configuration, Docker-ready.
